Performer:
Kiritake Kan'ya (see also Yoshida Kanya) (桐竹勘弥)

Alternate Name: Yoshida Kanya (吉田勘弥)

Dates: '1976-1986/10'

Specialty: Puppeteer

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.


Performances as Puppeteer:

September 1972 Bunraku Kyōshitsu: The Amorous Courier

May 1976: Kumagai at the Fan Shop

August 1984: The Murder in Revenge

September 1976 Kōkōsei no tame no Bunraku Kyōshitsu: The Amorous Courier

December 1976: The League of the 47 Ronin

February 1977: The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags

September 1977: The Love Suicides at Amijima

October 1977: The Courier for Hell

December 1978: The New Barrier of Ataka
